title: Books for Kids: Kelly’s Kitten (kids books Ages 3-10): Bedtime Stories For Kids, Children's Books, beginner reader
description: KINDLE UNLIMITED & AMAZON PRIME members can read this book for FREE!Children will enjoy not only looking at the beautiful colored cartoon photos but children can practice their reading skills with this book. Beginning and early readers can enjoy hours of fun and entertainment. This story is great for a quick bedtime story and to be read aloud with friends and family.Your child will love this story full of imagination for children. Books for Kelly’s KittenCan you remember the excitement that you felt during that time? Balloons, friends, dancing and sweets all make children very happy. Kelly knows that she is going to get all of these things and more! So obviously, she cannot even sit still from all the excitement. With her party around the corner, she eagerly counts down the hours. The most important part of a party is getting your present. There are no visible gifts in Kelly’s house though, only balloons. Is Kelly getting a present at her party? Yes she is! But what she is getting is not like any other present she has ever gotten… How so? Read and find out.
author: Robot J.
